title: Washington Monument: Contact Public Affairs
body: Contact Public Affairs       The Washington Monument is administered by National Mall and Memorial Parks.  Â       Contact Public Affairs  Contact the Public Affairs office by email or by calling 202-245-4676.  General Visitor Inquiries For general visitor questions, email, call 202-246-6841, or write to: National Mall and Memorial Parks 900 Ohio Drive, SW Washington, DC 20024
